ARABIC: وَأَخَذَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ فِى دِيَٰرِهِمْ جَٰثِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Great Blast seized hold of those who did wrong and morning found them lying flattened in their homes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The sinners were seized by a blast from heaven, and lay overturned in their homes in the morning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And the Blast overtook those who were wont to do wrong, and then they lay lifeless in their homes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: A blast struck the unjust and they were found lying motionless on their faces
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the terrible scream seized the unjust – so at morning they remained lying flattened in their homes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And As-Sayhah (awful cry) overtook the wrongdoers, so they lay (dead), prostrate in their homes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the rumbling overtook those who were unjust, so they became motionless bodies in their abodes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And the evildoers were seized by the Cry, and morning found them in their habitations fallen prostrate
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the (awful) Cry overtook those who did wrong, so that morning found them prostrate in their dwellings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The wrongdoers were overtaken by a dreadful blast and they lay dead in their homes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the shout overtook those who had done wrong; so they lay in their dwellings crouching
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The Cry seized those who were wrongdoers, and they lay lifeless prostrate in their homes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The (mighty) Blast overtook the wrong-doers, and they lay prostrate in their homes before the morning,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And As-Saihah (torment - awful cry, etc.) overtook the wrong-doers, so they lay (dead), prostrate in their homes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And the harmdoers were seized by the Shout (of the angel), and in the morning, they were found crouched in their dwellings, dead,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the Scream struck those who transgressed, and they became motionless bodies in their homes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes [corpses] fallen prone
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:67] And those who did evil were seized by the Cry, so that they ended up lying lifeless prostrate in their habitations, keeled over their knees, dead,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the (Awful) Cry) the Chastisement (overtook those who did wrong) the idolaters, (so that morning found them prostrate) lifeless, i.e. they became dust (in their dwellings) in their houses,
